new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2026-01-29) positions.

I will next review the overall exposure and make adjustments as necessary in future sessions based on market conditions and news. The current plan keeps a significant cash reserve of approximately 10% in order to manage the portfolio risk effectively.

This rebalancing has diversified the portfolio across multiple assets. Future adjustments will be guided by market data and news.
